title: O.J. Simpson living the lux life in Vegas mansion, one year out of jail
itunes:title: O.J. Simpson living the lux life in Vegas mansion, one year out of jail
description:
O.J. Simpson has managed to stay out of trouble while on parole from prison for a year. Nancy Grace takes a look at the convicted robber and kidnapper's post-prison life in Las Vegas and shares thoughts on why he should not be free. Southern California prosecutor Wendy Patrick, Los Angeles psycho analyst Dr. Bethany Marshall, Atlanta prosecutor Kenya Johnson, Atlanta criminal defense lawyer Eric Johnson, private investigator Vincent Hill, and syndicated radio host David Mack join the discussion.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
